title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description:
Gather and document the requirements for the AITestSuite project. The focus should be on identifying the following: types of tests to be generated (unit, integration, end-to-end, performance, security), supported programming languages and frameworks (e.g., Python, Java, JavaScript, React, Angular, Node.js, Django, Flask, Spring Boot), desired user experience (CLI, GUI, IDE plugin), test coverage goals (e.g., 80% code coverage, with the ability to configure the threshold as needed), performance requirements (e.g., generate tests within X seconds for Y lines of code, with the ability to scale as the project grows and adjust according to hardware resources), security considerations (e.g., secure handling of sensitive data, input validation, OWASP top 10 compliance, integration with popular security scanners like OWASP ZAP or SonarQube for static code analysis), scalability and maintainability requirements (modular design for easy updating and extension, efficient use of resources, consideration for future growth, support for containerization technologies like Docker and Kubernetes), edge cases (e.g., test for unusual inputs, error conditions, boundary values), best practices for error handling and exception management, and guidelines for customizing the test suite to specific project needs.

In addition, consider the integration with existing CI/CD tools and test runners (e.g., Jenkins, CircleCI, GitHub Actions, Travis CI, TeamCity, Bamboo, pytest, JUnit, Maven, Webpack) and any other relevant details that will help in the successful implementation of this project.

Once the requirements are gathered, perform an initial feasibility study to estimate timelines and resources needed for the project.

Upon completion, update the rfc_state field to 'READY_FOR_IMPLEMENTATION' and assign the task to the 'project-manager'.

title: Design System Architecture
description: Design the overall architecture of the AITestSuite system, including the components, data flow, and integration points with other tools.

title: Develop Code Analysis Engine
description: Implement the core engine that analyzes source code and understands its structure, logic, and dependencies.

title: Implement Test Generation Algorithms
description: Develop algorithms and techniques for generating comprehensive unit, integration, and end-to-end tests based on the analyzed code.

title: Build User Interface
description: Design and implement the user interface for the AITestSuite, allowing users to interact with the system, configure settings, and view generated tests.

title: Integrate with Existing Tools
description: Develop integrations with popular code editors, version control systems, and continuous integration/deployment (CI/CD) pipelines to seamlessly incorporate the AITestSuite into existing development workflows.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Ensure the AITestSuite adheres to security best practices, including secure coding practices, data encryption, and access control mechanisms.

title: Set up Testing Infrastructure
description: Establish a robust testing infrastructure for the AITestSuite itself, including unit tests, integration tests, and end-to-end tests.

title: Create Documentation
description: Develop comprehensive documentation for the AITestSuite, including user guides, developer documentation, and API references.

title: Plan Deployment and Maintenance
description: Develop a strategy for deploying and maintaining the AITestSuite, including hosting options, update mechanisms, and support channels.
